details.slurm: The script uses Slurm for job management and resource allocation. It utilizes one node with a single GPU and 12 CPUs per task, allocating 300 GB of RAM. It also uses the 'XXX' partition.
details.rsync: rsync is used to copy code files from the project directory to the output directory, excluding .out and .git files.
details.WandB: WandB is used for experiment tracking and logging.
details.GPU: The script requires a GPU for training, specified by the --gres=gpu:1 parameter.
details.CPU: The script requires 12 CPUs per task, as specified by the --cpus-per-task=12 parameter.
details.RAM: The script requires 300 GB of RAM, as specified by the --mem=300G parameter.
